tweets.text:
Oh dear.

QC has a view that the @EnvAgency must proactively safeguard SSSIs, SACs from harm, like abstraction.

CEO of EA says no we don't.

Just days later @Defra issue guidance to the EA "You MUST NOT WAIT until a site is harmed to put conservation measures in place." Oops. https://t.co/elg6fIrmQs
More inaccuracies included in the @EnvAgency email 2nd June 2020 on the pollution incident at Shardeloes Lake in the Misbourne Valley. We suspect the hand of HS2. https://t.co/zAllN1f84C

We have teams out around the #Shrewsbury area today monitoring river levels following recent rain on the upper Severn. Keep an eye on our website at https://t.co/nXbb6G3U4l for latest flood information https://t.co/IjgRzXVLmI
@adriancourt Hi, thanks for letting us know. I will pass on to our operations team so they are aware but this would be the responsibility of the @EnvAgency or @AnglianWater

I'm going to take a wild guess and say this enormous snake of construction waste has not been deposited under the R1 waste exemption, eh, @WasteCrimeWatch? Seen today a few hundred yards west of Sanderstead recreation ground, South Croydon. @EnvAgencySE. https://t.co/N413w3YO9t

urls.title: BLOG: World Mental Health Day - Trees for health and happiness | City of Trees
urls.description: World Mental Health Day, which takes place on 10 October, is a day for global mental health education and awareness. At City of Trees we know how being outside, whatever the weather, can make you feel healthier and happier. And there is a wealth of evidence demonstrating this crucial link. Humans are hardwired for nature Biophilia is a term popularized by American biologist

tweets.text: @networkrail You are cutting down the trees in my neighbourhood.... how‚Äôs that for damaging my neighbours and my family‚Äôs mental health? https://t.co/jkwKHzr6bg #cheshirewildlife #RSPCA_chester @CheshireWT @PTES @TheEWT @Protect_Wldlife @_WildlifeinNeed @EnvAgency @CECEcoDev @DefraGovUK

urls.title: Keybridge weir removal a success | Westcountry Rivers Trust

tweets.text:
Our rivers have the right to flow freely wherever they are. We restore and protect them in the #Westcountry such as our recent work with the @EnvAgency - find out more at: https://t.co/FJtVJ1P9x4
@intlrivers #DayofActionforRivers #RightsforRivers https://t.co/JmrGe5K3bb

The R. Misbourne at Bottom House Lane today, full of sewage and reeking to high heaven. Globally rare #chalkstream in the heart of the @ChilternsAONB @EnvAgency @ChilternSociety @Feargal_Sharkey @thameswater https://t.co/4Hr8tBwuBq

The many benefits of having healthy #soil was the topic of a talk for our delegates at #NFMCoP by @ilkleyIain from @EnvAgencyYNE.

Iain encourages #farmers to exchange knowledge with each other & gave tips for monitoring soil. https://t.co/LOOQbePnYk

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @defra If the EA @JamesBevanEA doesn‚Äôt think it should proactively safeguard SSSIs and SACs from harm what does he think it should do? Environmental protection is the reason it was set up.

1/3 Countryside Team Update: Tree planting at Monkmoor. 
Our team has planted an amazing 2,780 trees on the Monkmoor River Ground so far this winter & will be planting a further 300 this week. This work has been funded by @ShrewsburyTC, @EnvAgency & the #ERDF https://t.co/dWTPVaO0Lv

urls.title: The RSPB
urls.description: I‚Äôve joined over 60 organisations calling for nature‚Äôs recovery to be written into the #EnvironmentBill It only takes one min, will you? #StateofNature

tweets.text:
@RussellB1ggs @EnvAgencyAnglia @The_WMA @jamesowild @CharlieJGardner @N_Rivers_Trust @DefraWater @xrkingslynn @Feargal_Sharkey @WestNorfolkBC Seems it‚Äôs a strategy to mitigate symptoms which may contain the rancid water but damage the oak trees.  
If possible surely best to prevent the rancid water from happening in the first place. What‚Äôs the source?

@JohnFilowiat @EnvAgencyAnglia @The_WMA @jamesowild @CharlieJGardner @N_Rivers_Trust @DefraWater @xrkingslynn @Feargal_Sharkey @WestNorfolkBC ü§¢ü§Æüí©üíÄüêü‚òπÔ∏èAccording to the EA they are meant to check the bund on a daily basis this has been leaking alongside the tree since January 14th ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èthe bench is situated next to the breach & obviously they like the sound of the contaminated water as it‚Äôs released into the river ü§¨ https://t.co/gZWD91tVj0
